item.title: Toronto Festival Adds Bobby Farrelly, Brian Cox, Aziz Ansari and Guillermo del Toro Films
item.description: World bows have also been added for the latest movies starring Sydney Sweeney, Russell Crowe, Da’Vine Joy Randolph, Angelina Jolie, Seth Rogen, Keanu Reeves and Lily James.

item.title: 10 Colombian Directors to Watch
item.description: Narrowing Variety’s choice down to 10 was no small feat, given the surge of talent emerging from Colombia. Each year, more of its filmmakers win recognition at top-tier festivals, most recently
